name: augment-byok
description: Build single VSIX by patching upstream augment.vscode-augment (in-process BYOK shim)

scripts.gen: npm run gen:llm-endpoints && npm run gen:provider-types
scripts.check:fast: npm run check:llm-endpoints && npm run check:provider-types && npm run check:provider-dispatch && npm run check:payload-syntax && npm run check:codestyle && npm test
scripts.check: npm run check:fast && npm run check:contracts
